text: "Who's Gonna Ride Your Wild Horses" is a 1992 song by Irish rock band U2 and is the fifth single from their seventh studio album Achtung Baby. It went to number 2 in Portugal, number 3 in Italy, number 4 in Ireland, number 5 in Canada and Finland, number 9 in Australia and number 10 in Norway. Category:Rock ballads Category:1992 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:U2 songs Category:Garbage (band) songs
title: Who's Gonna Ride Your Wild Horses
